template.name: Template Net F5 BIG-IP SNMPv2
template.description:
Template Net F5 BIG-IP version: 0.14 Overview: https://support.f5.com/csp/article/K13322 MIB file Definition F5-BIGIP-APM-MIB.txt Defines APM objects, such as access and connectivity statistics, pool statistics, and general APM information F5-BIGIP-COMMON-MIB.txt Defines common information for which all other BIG-IP MIB files reference, as well as the F5-specific SNMP traps. F5-BIGIP-GLOBAL-MIB.txt Defines GTM objects, such as wide IPs, virtual servers, pools, links, servers, and datacenters. You can reset statistics for any of these objects. F5-BIGIP-LOCAL-MIB.txt Defines LTM objects, such as virtual servers, pools, nodes, profiles, SNATs, health monitors, and iRules. You can reset statistics for any of these objects. F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB.txt Defines BIG-IP system information, such as global statistic data, network information, and platform information. F5-BIGIP-WAM-MIB.txt1 Defines WebAccelerator traffic objects, such as WebAccelerator specific statistic data, connection stats, or build information. F5-BIGIP-EM-MIB.txt2 Defines Enterprise Manager objects, such as Device Lists, Device Groups and Images available on the system. You can reset statistics for any of these objects. SNMP monitoring: https://support.f5.com/kb/en-us/products/big-ip_ltm/manuals/product/tmos-concepts-11-1-0/tmos_snmp.html#1037650
MIBs used: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB

item.name: Загрузка процессора
Used memory
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The host memory in bytes currently in use for the system.

item.name: Total memory
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The total host memory in bytes for the system.

item.name: Memory utilization
item.description: Memory utilization in %

item.name: Модель
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The name of the system hardware model.

item.name: Серийный номер
item.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The system serial number.

item.name: HTTP Requests per second
item.description: The total number of HTTP requests to the system.

item.name: Client accepts per second
item.description: The number of connections accepted.

item.name: Client connections
item.description: The current connections from client-side to the system.

item.name: Client connections (SSL)
item.description: The current number of concurrent connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Client connects per second
item.description: The total connections from client-side to the system.

item.name: Client SSL connections per second (compat)
item.description: The current number of concurrent compat connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Client SSL connections per second (native)
item.description: The total number of concurrent native connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Server connections
item.description: The current connections from server-side to the system.

item.name: Server connections (SSL)
item.description: The current number of concurrent connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Server connects per second
item.description: The total connections from server-side to the system.

item.name: Server SSL connections per second (compat)
item.description: The total number of concurrent compat connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Server SSL connections per second (native)
item.description: The total number of concurrent native connections with established SSL sessions being maintained by the filter.

item.name: Client packets in
item.description: The number of packets received by the system from client-side.

item.name: Client packets out
item.description: The number of packets sent to client-side from the system.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The chassis temperature (in Celsius) of the indexed sensor on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The blade temperature (in Celsius) of the indexed sensor on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_DESCR}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:""}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_NAME}: Температура
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The temperature of the indexed CPU on the system. This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_NAME}: Скорость вращения вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The fan speed (in RPM) of the indexed CPU on the system., This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_NAME}: Температура выше нормы: >{$TEMP_WARN:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_NAME}: Температура очень высокая: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"CPU"}
trigger_prototype.description: Last value: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Статус вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The status of the indexed chassis fan on the system.,This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Скорость вращения вентилятора
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The actual speed of the indexed chassis fan on the system. This is only supported for the platform where the actual fan speed data is available. '0' means fan speed is unavailable while the associated chassis status is good.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPINDEX}: Статус блока питания
item_prototype.description: MIB: F5-BIGIP-SYSTEM-MIB The status of the indexed power supply on the system.,This is only supported for the platform where the sensor data is available.

trigger.expression: {Template Net F5 BIG-IP SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.diff()}=1 and {Template Net F5 BIG-IP SNMPv2:system.hw.serialnumber.strlen()}>0
trigger.name: Возможно замена устройства (получен новый серийный номер)
trigger.description: Последнее значение: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}. Изменился серийный номер устройства. Подтвердите и закройте.
